titles.title: To provide for a pay adjustment for the Chairman, Members, and General Counsel of the Federal Labor Relations Authority.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Compensation and Employee Benefits.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 7/13/1993--Introduced. Amends Federal law relating to Federal officials and employees to provide for pay adjustments for the Chairman, Members, and General Counsel of the Federal Labor Relations Authority.
